trans-unit.resname: PDP15·1 | Soul of Ravnica | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying {5}{U}{U}: Draw a card for each color among permanents you control. {5}{U}{U}, Exile Soul of Ravnica from your graveyard: Draw a card for each color among permanents you control.

trans-unit.resname: PDP15·2 | Soul of Zendikar | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Reach {3}{G}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. {3}{G}{G}, Exile Soul of Zendikar from your graveyard: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
